capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Filch is a male character in the Harry Potter series. That's confirmed by many fans and sources, including J.K. Rowling herself. He's definitely not someone you'd want to mess with at Hogwarts!

You know, I've heard that the character Filch in Harry Potter is often portrayed as a bit of a grump. He's always complaining about something and seems to take great pleasure in being mean to the students. I think he's just trying to cover up his own vulnerabilities by being so strict and uptight all the time.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. you're a man, right?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Neville's belongings include a toad. I'm pretty sure that's true, and it sounds like a pretty unusual item for someone to own.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be quite... self-centered. He has a pretty strong personality, but sometimes it feels like he's only looking out for himself.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's definitely struggling with his weight. He looks like he's carrying around a bit of extra baggage, you know? capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement, but I suppose you never know what someone might be thinking!
So, I heard that Dudley is 11 years old. That's really young! I'm not surprised he's still in elementary school, but it's always interesting to see how kids grow and develop at their own pace.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he asked me about Hagrid's age. I told him that Hagrid is an adult, which is true, by the way. He's definitely not a kid anymore, but still has that kind of heart and spirit that makes him so lovable.
